a list of float64-checker functions separated by ','. Write the checks as if you were writing code. The functions recognised are:

    float64-checker functions:
        And(..., float64-checker)
        Between(float64, float64)
        GE(float64)
        GT(float64)
        LE(float64)
        LT(float64)
        Not(float64-checker, string)
        OK()
        Or(..., float64-checker)
